Talk:Tumbler Minigame

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Variant: Additive Tumblers

This variant increases the difficulty by making the tool values variable. Instead of only the highest value tool in a tumbler applying, either; 1) the value of all tools in a tumbler are add together (ie, a tumbler with a 2 and a 3 tool give a 5 value). 2) the highest value tool in a tumbler is used, plus one for each additional tool in the tumbler.

Either variant increases the difficulty, and both shift the nature of the game.
